meanings.definition: To transfer data or files from a server or computer to a local device.
meanings.sent1: I will download the new game onto my phone.
meanings.sent2: She downloads music from the internet every day.
meanings.sent3: The computer decided to download a surprise update in the middle of the night.
meanings.sent4: His words seemed to download directly into her heart, leaving a lasting impact.
meanings.sent5: The download progress bar slowly filled up as the movie transferred to the tablet.

meanings.definition: The act of downloading data or files from the internet.
meanings.sent1: The download completed quickly due to the fast internet connection.
meanings.sent2: Every download brings new information to our fingertips.
meanings.sent3: The download sat patiently in the queue, waiting for its turn.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a constant download of interesting facts and trivia.
meanings.sent5: The download symbol on the screen indicated a successful transfer of data.

meanings.definition: A file or data that has been downloaded.
meanings.sent1: The download was saved in the 'Downloads' folder.
meanings.sent2: He opened the download to view the contents.
meanings.sent3: The download seemed to have a mind of its own, appearing in unexpected places.
meanings.sent4: The download was like a treasure chest of information waiting to be explored.
meanings.sent5: She eagerly clicked on the download to see what awaited her inside.
